attributes.action: Fracking is dangerous and burning gas produces CO2. Build the Severn Barrage.
attributes.additional_details:
Stop Fracking. Goverment policy on this is irresponsible.
Burning gas produces carbon dioxide.
There is already too much carbon dioxide in the atmosphere.
Do we want increasing temperatures, rising sea levels and more violent weather patterns?
The French have used tidal power successfully for years.
Build a tidal power station across the River Severn now.
